sources.title: Rhythm In The Clouds
sources.description: Comedy, Musical You can read about this movie on it's IMDB page.

sources.title: Rhythm in the Clouds
sources.description: In this musical comedy, a struggling songwriter (Patricia Ellis) fakes a letter of admittance into the apartment of a rich composer (Warren Hull). It is most convenient as the successful fellow is out of town. The girl is hungry and unable to pay her own rent, so she takes full advantage until he returns and finds his well-ordered life in shambles

sources.title: Rhythm in the Clouds (1937)
sources.description: Judy Walker is a poor songwriter who, through mistaken identity, gets her songs played on the radio. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/rhythm-in-the-clouds-1937/

sources.title: Rhythm in the Clouds (1937) COMEDY
sources.description:
Stars: Patricia Ellis, Warren Hull, William Newell 
Director: John H. Auer

In this screwball comedy, a struggling songwriter talks her way into the apartment of a famous composer, and finds that he's on vacation. Homeless and without any money, she decides to stay at his place and spread word that she's the composer's collaborator. Her plan works well until the composer returns home and finds his home and life in shambles!

metadata.Plot: Struggling songwriter Judy Walker talks her way into the apartment of a famous composer, and finds that he's on vacation. Homeless and without any money, she decides to stay at his place until his return, making use of all his belongings, and spreading the word that she is the composer's collaborator. She writes a song, wtih the composer listed as the co-writer, which becomes a big radio hit. The famous composer returns, and screwball comedy ensues.
metadata.Writer: Olive Cooper, Nathanael West, George Mence
metadata.Actors: Patricia Ellis, Warren Hull, William Newell
